mixed-citation.article-title: Hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) from the Vema and Valdivia seamounts (SE Atlantic)

tp:treatment-sec.p: Plumularia setacea – Ramil & Vervoort 1992: 191–193 , fig. 47f–i. — Ansín Agís et al . 2001: 238–245 , fig. 91.

Circumglobal, with a bathymetric range of 0 to 1517 m ( Ansín Agís et al. 2001 ; Gil 2017). In the Southeast Atlantic, it was reported from Angola ( Broch 1914 ; Bouillon et al. 1995 ), Namibia ( Broch 1914 ; Gili et al. 1989 ), Vema Seamount ( Millard 1966 ) and South Africa (Millard 1975).
